item.title: Flutter: Adding sign in with Google and phone authentication to yourÂ app
item.description: This was my first tech related publication on any platform available and I’m kinda proud of the response! I just published it on dev.to and a few days ago on Medium. It’s an interesting experience as while I was writing it, a lot of ideas about optimizing the code came and, well, I ended up doing them as you can see on the repo’s commit list.
